scripts.preinstall: if [ -d resources/bootstrap ]; then rm -r resources/bootstrap; fi
scripts.install: mkdir -p resources/bootstrap/js && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/scss resources/bootstrap && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/js/dist/* resources/bootstrap/js && cp -R node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.js* resources/bootstrap/js
